ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: Computer Specs for Bards CPU: P3 700 RAM: 256 Video Card (and RAM): GEForce, 32 Video Resolution: 1024x768 Sound Card: Turtle beach sunthin HD speed (rpm):7200
ygData.messageBody:
Computer Specs for Bards

CPU: P3 700
RAM: 256
Video Card (and RAM): GEForce, 32
Video Resolution: 1024x768
Sound Card: Turtle beach sunthin
HD speed (rpm):7200 rpm
'Net speed: Cable Modem
Geographic Location: Texas, pardner
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: 2 layer
Particle Effects: low because of the damn Blade of Fiery Lamentations

as well as to see past my own effects
Mip Mapping: off
Clip plane distance: max except in Warsliks woods and Kurns tower

How many songs can you twist? 3-4 easily, if there is is a lot of AE going
on (because of the damn Blade of Fiery Lamentations) I still have to switch
to overhead view to lose the lag. The BoFL will at times cause slightly less
than 1 second screen freezes.

Do you slow down when it rains? no, sometimes I get a little sad, but I have
some nice Earl Grey Tea and read some Rainer Maria Rilke and after a while
everything seems like it is going to be okay...

How about in Unrest or Kunark? Unrest is now wonderfully huntable


Tszaaz/Tsengu


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
